genresAdvancedInfo.name: classic assamese pop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: This genre of music originated in the northeastern state of Assam in India. It is a fusion of traditional Assamese folk music and western pop music. Classic Assamese Pop has a unique sound that is characterized by the use of traditional instruments such as the dhol, pepa, and taal. The lyrics of the songs are usually in Assamese and revolve around themes of love, nature, and culture.
